title: Making Plants High-Tech With Artificial Neurons | SciShow News
description:
Visit http://brilliant.org/scishow/ to get started learning STEM for free, and the first 200 people will get 20% off their annual premium subscription.

Biology and technology grew closer together when scientists manufactured neurons that acted like those in a brain! And birds evolved to protect themselves in two ways: fight and flight. 

Hosted by: Hank Green

SciShow is on TikTok!  Check us out at https://www.tiktok.com/@scishow

title: The 19th Century Science That's Fighting Climate Change Today
description:
The HMS Challenger embarked in the 1870s to survey the world’s oceans. The data the expedition collected is still being used over 100 years later to inform what we know about climate change.

Hosted by: Hank Green

SciShow is on TikTok!  Check us out at https://www.tiktok.com/@scishow 
----------
